name: Collect data with 'cloud backup restore' approach
description: Restore a device's cloud backup to a donor device, then subsequently use a local acquisition approach on that donor device, e.g. T1019/T1020
references: Geus, J., Gruber, J., Wozar, J. and Freiling, F., 2025. From sync to seizure: A binary instrumentation-based evaluation of the iCloud backup process. Forensic Science International: Digital Investigation, 54, p.301978.
